description:
Guitar Fundamentals for Beginners is the first step in a series of courses for students to begin their journey into learning how to be a complete guitarist. This particular course teaches the basics from knowing the parts of the guitar to strumming and basic chords. You will also learn how to tune your guitar, and at the end, you'll know the basics needed to be a guitarist.

This course is for anyone who has ever dreamt of playing guitar or those who just want something to do for leisure. It is structured in a basic and easy to follow format. In order to complete this course, students will need their own guitar and pick to be able to follow along.

So if you're ready to take up guitar or you dream of being an amazing guitarist, then this is the course for you!
title: Guitar Fundamentals for Beginners
